mapper.sql: id, org_id, bud_id, bud_code, bud_name, grp_id, grp_code, grp_name, res_code, res_name, res_no, unit_no, bud_area, house_floor, floor_num, rental_area, fee_area, use_area, res_type, porp_user, rent_status, res_status, deco_status, fin_status, ser_status, is_affect, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into s_house ( id, org_id, bud_id, bud_code, bud_name, grp_id, grp_code, grp_name, res_code, res_name, res_no, unit_no, bud_area, house_floor, floor_num, rental_area, fee_area, use_area, res_type, porp_user, rent_status, res_status, deco_status, fin_status, ser_status, is_affect, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.budId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.budCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.budName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.grpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.grpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.grpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.budArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.houseFloor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.floorNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rentalArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.feeArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.useArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.porpUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.decoStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.finStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.serStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isAffect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select t.* from( select bud_id,bud_name from s_house where org_id=#{orgId} group by bud_id,bud_name )t where t.bud_id is not null
select t.* from( select unit_no from s_house where org_id=#{orgId} group by unit_no )t where t.unit_no is not null
select t.* from( select unit_no,floor_num from s_house where org_id=#{orgId} group by unit_no,floor_num )t where t.unit_no is not null
select h.* from s_house h inner join t_cst_into_house i on i.house_id = h.id where i.delete_flag = 0 and i.into_status = 0 and i.cst_into_id = #{cstIntoId}

select cst.code as cst_code, cst.cst_name ,h.res_name from s_house h inner JOIN s_rcr r on r.res_id = h.id inner JOIN s_cst cst on r.cst_id = cst.id where h.is_affect = 1 and r.is_affect = 1 and h.bud_id = #{budId} group by cst.code,cst.cst_name,h.res_name

select h.id, h.unit_no, cst.code as cst_code, cst.cst_name ,h.res_code, h.res_name, h.floor_num from s_house h inner JOIN s_rcr r on r.res_id = h.id inner JOIN s_cst cst on r.cst_id = cst.id where h.is_affect = 1 and r.is_affect = 1 and h.org_id = #{orgId} group by h.id, h.unit_no, cst.code,cst.cst_name,h.res_code, h.res_name, h.floor_num

select h.*,cst.code as cst_code, cst.cst_name from s_house h LEFT JOIN s_rcr r on r.res_id = h.id LEFT JOIN s_cst cst on r.cst_id = cst.id where h.is_affect = 1 and r.is_affect = 1
and h.bud_name like CONCAT('%', #{budName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '/'
and h.org_id = #{projectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and h.unit_no like CONCAT('%', #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '/'
and h.res_name like CONCAT('%', #{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '/'
and cst.code like CONCAT('%', #{cstCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '/'
and cst.cst_name like CONCAT('%', #{cstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '/'
